org.deidentifier.arx.kettle

Class ARXPluginMeta

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pentaho.di.trans.step.BaseStepMeta
      • org.deidentifier.arx.kettle.ARXPluginMeta
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, org.pentaho.di.trans.step.StepMetaInterface

    public class ARXPluginMeta
extends org.pentaho.di.trans.step.BaseStepMeta
implements org.pentaho.di.trans.step.StepMetaInterface
    The class contains the configuration of the step for both, the Processing and the Dialog. In this class also the loading from the configurationstorage is written.
    You have the option to store either in a XML File or in a database, what you more like to do, you can do.
    Since:
    10.05.2016
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Florian Wiedner
